title: One-Act Play Magazine
aka: One-Act Play Magazine and Theater Review
One-Act Play Magazine and Radio-Drama Review
additional-notes: Renewals are recorded beginning in the 1968 July-December CCE volume (for 'One-Act Play Magazine and Radio-Drama Review'), but the earliest renewed contribution is noted in the 1969 January-June volume.

Any plays published in this serial might have renewals under Drama, rather than under Contributions to Periodicals.  We have not surveyed Drama renewals, so it is possible there are issues with renewed material prior to the first contribution mentioned here.
